meaningMnemonic: When a <kanji>light</kanji> shines on how much you've <kanji>prosper</kanji>ed, it's a great <vocabulary>honor</vocabulary>. You don't feel like you did anything so special, but it's really a privilege for the light to come down on you like this.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
